title: [Health] Following the diet recommended by the American Heart Association – high in fish, whole grains, omega-3 fatty acids and folic acid – before pregnancy, decreases the chance of miscarriage by 13-15%

[Medicine] Study found an association between the ketogenic diet and an improvement in reproductive hormone levels, which influence fertility, in women with PCOS. The ketogenic (keto) diet may lower testosterone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS).
